resources.string: Blokada Plus is active, and your Internet is protected
Blokada Plus is active without adblocking
Blokada is active in DNS mode
Help others to learn about Blokada
Try Blokada Slim and keep your privacy protected! Get it at Google Play.
Tap to get the open source edition
Sorry, your device is not supported by Blokada Plus. You can still use other features.
Could not connect to gateway. Are you online?
Could not verify account. Are you online?
You have no filters configured. Check your adblocking and wifi settings.
Some lists could not be loaded; select fewer lists in Ad blocking settings.
Tap on one of the options to configure to turn it on (or off) for your trigger.
Välj listor att använda som filter. Standardvalet räcker i de flesta fall.
Lägg till egna regler för att finjustera filtret.
See what has been blocked or allowed recently.
Why do I need Blokada Plus?
If your account is new, visit our website. You cannot purchase a subscription in Blokada Slim.
Tap your avatar above to see your account ID. Remember, your ID is secret and you should keep it to yourself. Write it down in case you uninstall the app.
Här kan du återställa ditt tidigare konto ifall att du ominstallerade appen.
With Blokada Plus your data is encrypted, your IP address is hidden, and your location is changed.
In order to use the VPN, you need an active account. Check or restore your account here.
Välj ett mellanhopp att ansluta till. Din enhet kommer att skicka all trafik via den platsen och öka din anonymitet gentemot sajter du besöker.
If you experience any problems, do not hesitate to contact us.
Yes! Your account is automatically created on first run. You do not need to register.
Tap your avatar above to see your account ID.
Your account ID is secret and you should not show it to anyone.
Write down your account ID in case you need to reinstall the app.
DNS ansvarar för att översätta namn på sajter till IP-adresser. Att välja rätt DNS kan göra din enhet snabbare och skydda din integritet.

Some apps may not work properly with Blokada. For example, they may have trouble connecting.

Activating VPN often helps in those cases.

Otherwise, you can make those apps bypass Blokada inspection altogether. Remember, bypassed apps communicate outside of Blokada Plus.
Systemappar är de appar som kom förinstallerade på din enhet. Vissa är helt gömda. Ändra endast i dessa inställningar om du har koll på vad du gör.
Filterlistor innehåller regler för att filtrera reklam och statistikinsamlingar. Försök att inte aktivera för många listor samtidigt.
Hosts you add here will never be blocked. Use this list when, for example, a website you visit is mistakenly blocked. Note that this does not apply to bypassed apps.
Hosts you add here will always be blocked. For example, you may add websites that are not blocked by the standard lists, but should be. Note that this does not apply to bypassed apps.
Att dela din logg hjälper oss att upptäcka orsaken till ditt problem. Se till att du skickar loggen privat till en medlem av Blokadas inre krets.
Exkludera appar som inte fungerar korrekt
